评论详情: Great Tops- I have this one and a white one. Very flattering. I highly recommend.
I loved the color and fit.  I just wish it came in a size XS

Shirt was comfy to wear in 90 degree heat. Fit is accurate to the size guide.  The sleeves don’t pinch my arms (like a similar style from another brand). Wrinkles easily iron out after washing (unlike a similar style from another brand). I will be ordering more in different colors.
